markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">
[Implosion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1572)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 338 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodlines**
[Demonic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=21), [Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=27)

**Deities**
[Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=337), [Nulgreth](/Deities.aspx?ID=558)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 corporeal creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You crush the target by causing it to collapse in on itself, dealing 75 damage. The first time each round you Sustain the spell, you must choose a new target to be subject to the same effect; the same creature can never be targeted more than once with a single casting of this spell. You also can't affect more than one creature per turn with _implosion_. You can't target a creature that's [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222), gaseous, or liquid, or otherwise lacking a solid form.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 10.
name: Implosion

text: Implosion Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 338 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Bloodlines Demonic, Imperial Deities Dahak, Nulgreth Range 30 feet Target 1 corporeal creature Defense basic Fortitude Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You crush the target by causing it to collapse in on itself, dealing 75 damage. The first time each round you Sustain the spell, you must choose a new target to be subject to the same effect; the same creature can never be targeted more than once with a single casting of this spell. You also can't affect more than one creature per turn with implosion . You can't target a creature that's incorporeal, gaseous, or liquid, or otherwise lacking a solid form. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 10.
